issue.title: [CF 604] Stacks Filter
issue.body:
Calling the display text [Stacks(1,10):Hide('0')]  in an internal cooldown or condition icon does not filter to 'hide' when there are zero stacks.
Is this expected? version 6.0.3 r597

More explicitly, I'm trying to create an icon that shows the time remaining on a debuff, and on the same icon, the stacks from another buff (Guardian of Ancient Kings, 30 second buff uptime, builds 20 stacks of Ancient Power).
